plot: In 1195, an inventor wakes up his Lord in the middle of the night to show him his newest invention - 'The Closet Hole'. While sitting on the said object, the King falls asleep and dreams of future times.
title: Le grand trou
plot_es: In 1195, an inventor wakes up his Lord in the middle of the night to show him his newest invention - 'The Closet Hole'. While sitting on the said object, the King falls asleep and dreams of future times.
